recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: In my dreams, I see the filth and ice of Sobibor again. A cruel laughter hisses in my ear. Something is coming.

recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: Frost pinches the windows and shadow crisps the candle-flames. My reflection in a knife-blade shivers like an image on the surface of water. Something is coming.

recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: Silence descends. The wind grows bitter and cold. There is a stinging scent on the air - gunpowder and iron and blood. The slightest whiff of it makes old wounds ache. Something is coming.

recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: Silence descends. The wind grows bitter and cold. There is a stinging scent on the air - gunpowder and iron and blood. The slightest whiff of it makes old wounds ache. Something is coming.

recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: The guns grow louder. Fires on the horizon grow brilliant and fierce. There is a stench in the air, like kerosene and blood and heat - such a strangling heat. Something is coming.

recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: The guns grow louder. Fires on the horizon grow brilliant and fierce. There is a stench in the air, like kerosene and blood and heat - such a strangling heat. Something is coming.

recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: The wind peals like a scream. Nightmares have become common amongst the men. And when I find the time to sleep, I dream, too: of hoofbeats on the earth; of a scarlet in the snow; of rank, yellow teeth bared in a smile.

recipes.label: A Terrifying Force
recipes.startdescription: The wind peals like a scream. Nightmares have become common amongst the men. And when I find the time to sleep, I dream, too: of hoofbeats on the earth; of a scarlet in the snow; of rank, yellow teeth bared in a smile.

recipes.label: The Edge-Long Prowls
recipes.startdescription:
@#foe.exile|'Here we are again. Let's see if you took any of my lessons to heart.'#foe.duffoure|'You wish to escape from all this? Come here, then. I offer you an escape.'#foe.camilla|'This is war. It will not be clean, swift, or pleasant. But it will be necessary.'#foe.wilhelm|'Where are your warriors? Your strong and your brave? Show yourselves - it is not becoming of a soldier to shirk a good death.'#foe.sergei|'Too many years without blood - The land has forgotten terror. But I will put things right.'@

[The Edge-Long will attempt to kill you and your Allies until you leave the Current Warzone.]

recipes.startdescription:
@#foe.exile|'Here we are again. Let's see if you took any of my lessons to heart.'#foe.duffoure|'You wish to escape from all this? Come here, then. I offer you an escape.'#foe.camilla|'This is war. It will not be clean, swift, or pleasant. But it will be necessary.'#foe.wilhelm|'Where are your warriors? Your strong and your brave? Show yourselves - it is not becoming of a soldier to shirk a good death.'#foe.sergei|'Too many years without blood - The land has forgotten terror. But I will put things right.'@

[The Edge-Long will attempt to kill you and your Allies until you leave the Current Warzone.]

recipes.startdescription:
@#foe.exile|'Here we are again. Let's see if you took any of my lessons to heart.'#foe.duffoure|'You wish to escape from all this? Come here, then. I offer you an escape.'#foe.camilla|'This is war. It will not be clean, swift, or pleasant. But it will be necessary.'#foe.wilhelm|'Where are your warriors? Your strong and your brave? Show yourselves - it is not becoming of a soldier to shirk a good death.'#foe.sergei|'Too many years without blood - The land has forgotten terror. But I will put things right.'@

[The Edge-Long will attempt to kill you and your Allies until you leave the Current Warzone.]

recipes.label: The Edge-Long Strikes!
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.exile|'You're nothing.'#foe.duffoure|'Get out of my way.'#foe.camilla|'You die doing your duty. That is a better end than most can hope for.'#foe.wilhelm|'Hah! More! The day is not done until the dead pile at our waists!'#foe.sergei|'Hrgh. More dead.'@

recipes.label: The Edge-Long Strikes!
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.sergei|'Hrgh. More dead.'@

recipes.label: Annihilated!
recipes.startdescription: Crushed underfoot by the Edge-Long - they didn't stand a chance.

recipes.label: A Secret, Weaponized
recipes.startdescription: The Iron-Eater recoils from what I have shown him. I will keep this sliver of unkind revelation close to me -

recipes.label: Exhausted!
recipes.startdescription: I've employed these against my opponent, and I will need time before I can effectively employ them again -

recipes.label: Equaled Force
recipes.startdescription: My immortal ally has put up a competent defence against the Edge-Long's attack. They'll be ready again to assist me in short order -

recipes.label: The Edge-Long Strikes!
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.exile|'What will this dog do, then? Bow, bolt, or bite?'#foe.duffoure|'I will make it clean - if you allow me to.'#foe.camilla|'Killing you could be a novel little exercise. Maybe.'#foe.wilhelm|'You - cracking your bones will make a fine warmup for the real battle.'#foe.sergei|'I'll rip you apart, little soldier.'@ [To defend, provide an Ally to put between you and and Edge-Long's attack. This will kill the Ally.]

recipes.label: An Immortal Ally
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.exile|'Oh - well, that's a nasty surprise.'#foe.duffoure|'They can't keep you safe forever.'#foe.camilla|'Purchasing your escape with blood? I hope you've deep pockets.'#foe.wilhelm|'This is how you conduct yourself? Using your brothers as a shield? Running? Disgusting.'#foe.sergei|'Fly, little soldier! Run! Tell your comrades how I made them beg for the end!'@

recipes.label: A Shard of Cruel Reality
recipes.startdescription: The Iron-Eater pulls hard on the reins of his horse when he hears me say it. His hand stops. His jaw tightens. Then he spits an old curse at me, and rides off in another direction so that he may kill and plunder elsewhere, so that he will not have to hear me say the name 'Kazimir.'

recipes.label: Defence, Inviolate
recipes.startdescription: The meridians of my soul align with the meridians of my flesh. My scars armour me. I cannot be wounded.

recipes.label: Thrown to the Fires
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.exile|'Who needs them, anyway?'#foe.duffoure|'Where do you think you're running? Away from all of this? Or towards?'#foe.camilla|'Purchasing your escape with blood? I hope you've deep pockets.'#foe.wilhelm|'This is how you conduct yourself? Using your brothers as a shield? Running? Disgusting.'#foe.sergei|'Fly, little soldier! Run! Tell your comrades how I made them beg for the end!'@

recipes.label: Left Defenseless!
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.exile|'That looked like it hurt.'#foe.duffoure|'Quiet. It'll all be over soon.'#foe.camilla|'There - that's a lesson you won't be quick to forget.'#foe.wilhelm|'Oh? Not dead outright? Very impressive.'#foe.sergei|'Cry out - God is not listening, but I am.'@

recipes.label: The Iron-Eater Retreats!
recipes.startdescription: The Iron-Eater rears his horse high - and turns from the battle! He gallops with haste, his head low.
recipes.description: We won't be seeing him for a good while, I think.

recipes.label: Pain and Terror
recipes.startdescription: Is this what it all comes to? Will this be the blow that ends me?

recipes.label: Pain and Terror
recipes.startdescription: Is this what it all comes to? Will this be the blow that ends me?

recipes.label: The Continental Intervenes!
recipes.startdescription: 'Wilhelm - you've been wasting my time, gallivanting about. You know how much I appreciate punctuality.' The brilliant flash of the Continental's rapier is like a lightning bolt -
recipes.description: - and the two immortals are locked in combat. Nothing else exists to them. I watch for a minute, awed by what seems like a beautifully choreographed dance between two masters - and then I must dive out of the way. The two Long disappear into the din of battle.

recipes.label: The Warmaker Intervenes!
recipes.startdescription: 'Darling,' the Warmaker spits through gritted teeth. 'Lateness does not suit you. You've some explaining to do.' The rush of the Warmaker's fist oncoming is like a falling star -
recipes.description: - and the two immortals are locked in combat. Nothing else exists to them. I watch for a minute, awed by what seems like a beautifully choreographed dance between two masters - and then I must dive out of the way. The two Long disappear into the din of battle.

recipes.label: The Edge-Long Strikes!
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.exile|'You're nothing.'#foe.duffoure|'Get out of my way.'@
